abstract: Citadel Investment Group, the hedge fund giant run by Kenneth C. Griffin, will start winding down its $1 billion fund of funds and put the capital into other businesses, including investing in hedge fund start-ups.
lead_paragraph: Citadel Investment Group, the hedge fund giant run by Kenneth C. Griffin, will start winding down its $1 billion fund of funds and put the capital into other businesses, including investing in hedge fund start-ups.

headline.main: Citadel to Shutter $1 Billion Fund of Hedge Funds
